verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the crown <S%H5850><s%> of pride <S%H1348><s%> of the drunkards <S%H7910><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and to the fading <S%H5034><s%> flower <S%H6731><s%> of his glorious <S%H6643><s%> beauty <S%H8597><s%>, which is on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the fat <S%H8081><s%> valley <S%H1516><s%> of them that are overcome <S%H1986><s%> with wine <S%H3196><s%>!

In that day <S%H3117><s%> will Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> become a crown <S%H5850><s%> of glory <S%H6643><s%>, and a diadem <S%H6843><s%> of beauty <S%H8597><s%>, unto the residue <S%H7605><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>;

and a spirit <S%H7307><s%> of justice <S%H4941><s%> to him that sitteth <S%H3427><s%> in judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and strength <S%H1369><s%> to them that turn <S%H7725><s%> back the battle <S%H4421><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%>.

And even these <S%H428><s%> reel <S%H7686><s%> with wine <S%H3196><s%>, and stagger <S%H8582><s%> with strong drink <S%H7941><s%>; the priest <S%H3548><s%> and the prophet <S%H5030><s%> reel <S%H7686><s%> with strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, they are swallowed up <S%H1104><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>, they stagger <S%H8582><s%> with strong drink <S%H7941><s%>; they err <S%H7686><s%> in vision <S%H7203><s%>, they stumble <S%H6328><s%> in judgment <S%H6417><s%>.

Whom will he teach <S%H3384><s%> knowledge <S%H1844><s%>? and whom will he make to understand <S%H995><s%> the message <S%H8052><s%>? them that are weaned <S%H1580><s%> from the milk <S%H2461><s%>, and drawn <S%H6267><s%> from the breasts <S%H7699><s%>?

For it is precept <S%H6673><s%> upon precept <S%H6673><s%>, precept <S%H6673><s%> upon precept <S%H6673><s%>; line <S%H6957><s%> upon line <S%H6957><s%>, line <S%H6957><s%> upon line <S%H6957><s%>; here a little <S%H2191><s%>, there a little <S%H2191><s%>.

Wherefore hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, ye <S%H582><s%> scoffers <S%H3944><s%>, that rule <S%H4910><s%> this people <S%H582><s%> that is in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>:

Because ye have said <S%H559><s%>, We have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with death <S%H4194><s%>, and with Sheol <S%H7585><s%> are we <S%H6213><s%> at agreement <S%H2374><s%>; when the overflowing <S%H7857><s%> scourge <S%H7752><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%>, it shall not come <S%H935><s%> unto us <S%H7760><s%>; for we have made lies <S%H3577><s%> our refuge <S%H4268><s%>, and under falsehood <S%H8267><s%> have we hid ourselves <S%H5641><s%>:

therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Behold <S%H3245><s%>, I lay in Zion <S%H6726><s%> for a foundation a stone <S%H68><s%>, a tried <S%H976><s%> stone <S%H68><s%>, a precious <S%H3368><s%> corner <S%H6438><s%>- stone of sure <S%H3245><s%> foundation <S%H4143><s%>: he that believeth <S%H539><s%> shall not be in haste <S%H2363><s%>.

And I will make <S%H7760><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%> the line <S%H6957><s%>, and righteousness <S%H6666><s%> the plummet <S%H4949><s%>; and the hail <S%H1259><s%> shall sweep away <S%H3261><s%> the refuge <S%H4268><s%> of lies <S%H3577><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> shall overflow <S%H7857><s%> the hiding-place <S%H5643><s%>.

And your covenant <S%H1285><s%> with death <S%H4194><s%> shall be annulled <S%H3722><s%>, and your agreement <S%H2380><s%> with Sheol <S%H7585><s%> shall not stand <S%H6965><s%>; when the overflowing <S%H7857><s%> scourge <S%H7752><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%>, then ye shall be trodden down by it <S%H4823><s%>.

As often <S%H1767><s%> as it passeth though <S%H5674><s%>, it shall take <S%H3947><s%> you <S%H1242><s%>; for morning by morning <S%H1242><s%> shall it pass through <S%H5674><s%>, by day <S%H3117><s%> and by night <S%H3915><s%>: and it shall be nought but terror <S%H2113><s%> to understand <S%H995><s%> the message <S%H8052><s%>.

For the bed <S%H4702><s%> is shorter <S%H7114><s%> than that a man can stretch <S%H8311><s%> himself on it <S%H4541><s%>; and the covering narrower <S%H6887><s%> than that he can wrap himself in it <S%H3664><s%>.

For Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will rise up <S%H6965><s%> as in mount <S%H2022><s%> Perazim <S%H6559><s%>, he will be wroth <S%H7264><s%> as in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%>; that he may do <S%H6213><s%> his work <S%H4639><s%>, his strange <S%H2114><s%> work <S%H4639><s%>, and bring to pass <S%H5647><s%> his act <S%H5656><s%>, his strange <S%H5237><s%> act <S%H5656><s%>.

Now therefore be ye not scoffers <S%H3887><s%>, lest your bonds <S%H4147><s%> be made strong <S%H2388><s%>; for a decree <S%H2782><s%> of destruction <S%H3617><s%> have I heard <S%H8085><s%> from the Lord <S%H136><s%>, Jehovah <S%H136><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, upon the whole earth <S%H776><s%>.
Give ye ear <S%H238><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>; hearken <S%H7181><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> my speech <S%H565><s%>.
Doth he that ploweth <S%H2790><s%> to sow <S%H2232><s%> plow <S%H2790><s%> continually <S%H3117><s%>? doth he continually open <S%H6605><s%> and harrow <S%H7702><s%> his ground <S%H127><s%>?

When he hath levelled <S%H7737><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> thereof <S%H6327><s%>, doth he not cast abroad the fitches <S%H7100><s%>, and scatter <S%H2236><s%> the cummin <S%H3646><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> in the wheat <S%H2406><s%> in rows <S%H7795><s%>, and the barley <S%H8184><s%> in the appointed <S%H5567><s%> place <S%H3698><s%>, and the spelt in the border thereof <S%H1367><s%>?

For the fitches <S%H7100><s%> are not threshed <S%H1758><s%> with a sharp threshing instrument <S%H2742><s%>, neither is a cart <S%H5699><s%> wheel <S%H212><s%> turned about <S%H5437><s%> upon the cummin <S%H3646><s%>; but the fitches <S%H7100><s%> are beaten out <S%H2251><s%> with a staff <S%H4294><s%>, and the cummin <S%H3646><s%> with a rod <S%H7626><s%>.
